channel.title: TaiwanPlus - Latest News
channel.description: Your source of news, culture, and infotainment from Taiwan, a voice of freedom in Asia.

item.title: Endangered Formosan Flying Fox Pup Rescued in Hualien
item.description: In a first for conservation, a two-week-old Formosan flying fox pup has been rescued in the eastern city of Hualien. This subspecies of the Ryukyu flying fox is considered endanger

item.title: Rain and Rockslides Worsen Damage in Hualien From Earthquake
item.description: Rain and rockslides are making a difficult situation worse in eastern Taiwan's earthquake-hit Hualien County.

item.title: Taiwanâ€™s Back-Faced Spoonbill Numbers Decline Despite Global Growth
item.description: There's been fewer sightings of black-faced spoonbills overwintering in Taiwan this year, despite overall growth in the endangered migratory birds' population.

item.title: Think Tank Bullish on Taiwan's 2024 Economic Growth
item.description: The Taiwan Institute of Economic Research has raised its growth forecast for the country this year to 3.29%, citing increased exports and steady domestic consumption.
